description: Stage is the Schema for the stages API.

apiVersion.description:
APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.
Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and
may reject unrecognized values.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description:
Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.
Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to.
Cannot be updated.
In CamelCase.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: StageSpec defines the desired state of Stage.

cdPipeline.description: Name of CD pipeline which this Stage will be linked to.

order.description: The order to lay out Stages

qualityGates.description: A list of quality gates to be processed

items.description: QualityGate defines a single quality for a release.

autotestName.description: A name of autotests to run with quality gate

branchName.description: A branch name to use from autotests repository

qualityGateType.description: A type of quality gate, e.g. "Manual", "Autotests"

source.description: Specifies a source of a pipeline library which will run release

library.description: A reference to a non default source library

branch.description: Branch which should be used for a library

type.description: Type of pipeline library, e.g. default, library

triggerType.description: Stage provisioning trigger type. E.g. Manual, Auto

status.description: StageStatus defines the observed state of Stage.

available.description: This flag indicates neither Stage are initialized and ready to work. Defaults to false.

detailed_message.description:
Detailed information regarding action result
which were performed

last_time_updated.description: Information when  the last time the action were performed.

shouldBeHandled.description: Should update of status be handled. Defaults to false.

status.description: Specifies a current status of Stage.

username.description: Name of user who made a last change.

value.description: Specifies a current state of Stage.
